item.title: (Ref) Tools to Design or Visualize Architecture of Neural Network
item.description: Tools to Design or Visualize Architecture of Neural Network draw_convnet : Python script for illustrating Convolutional Neural Network (ConvNet) NNSVG PlotNeuralNet : Latex code for drawing neural networks for reports and presentation. Have a look into examples to see how they are made. Additionally, lets consolidate any improvements that you make and fix any bugs to help more people with this code. Tensorboard - TensorBoardâ€™s Graphs dashboard is a powerful tool for examining your TensorFlow model.
